Posts.Content: thank you for your prayers and mine are with you and your sister and everyone else this terrible disease affects.
Posts.Title: 4th time getting cancer in the lymph nodes

Posts.Content: yesterday i got the news that my cancer has "woken up" again in both underarms...i've already had both breasts removed and 3 surgeries...can anyone relate to all this...i've also had 2 radiations and 3 different chemos...i am getting a little sick of all this...
Posts.Title: 4th time getting cancer in the lymph nodes
